body.directions: Read each word or phrase in Chinese, and then answer the question that follows.

body.quiz: Which of the following has a character that’s the same as one of the characters in the word presented?
body.answer: Audio for 浴室 yùshì
options: Audio for 老师 lǎoshī
Audio for 或是 huòshì
Audio for 准时 zhǔnshí
body.correct: Job wonderfully done! 卧室 wòshì has the character 室, which is the same as the second character in 浴室 yùshì (bathroom).
body.incorrect: Not quite. Listen to the audios in the choices, and then recall the characters that are in them. Compare them to the characters in the word presented and find a match. Careful—don’t be confused by the characters with similar pronunciations in the choices.

body.quiz: When are you most likely in the location indicated by the word presented?
body.correct: Very nice job! 客厅 kètīng means “living room.” Of the activities in the choices, watching TV most likely takes place in a living room. Imagine taking a shower there.
body.incorrect: Oops...Think about the meaning of the word presented, and then review the activities in the choices. Consider where you will reasonably do each of these activities.

body.quiz: Which of the following has the same initial as the second character in the word presented?
body.answer: Audio for 制服 zhìfú
options: Audio for 卧室 wòshì
Audio for 公寓 gōngyù
Audio for 字典 zìdiǎn
body.correct: You got it! The second character 房 fáng in the word 厨房 chúfáng has the initial “f.” So does the second character 服 fú in the word 制服 zhìfú (uniform).
body.incorrect: Not quite. First identify the initial of the second character in the word presented; then listen to the words in the choices to see which one has the same initial.

body.quiz: Which of the following sentences can best be completed with the word presented?
options: 我们在_____上体育课。Wǒmen zài _____shàng tǐyùkè.
body.correct: You got it! 饭厅 fàntīng means “dining room.” This word can best complete the sentence 我在饭厅吃晚餐。Wǒ zài fàntīng chī wǎncān. (I am having dinner in the dining room.)
body.incorrect: Not quite…Think about the meaning of 饭厅 fàntīng and what location in a house it indicates, and then place it in the sentences in the choices to see which one fits the best for both meaning and structure.
